===Etymology===

===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Zhejiang]], the [[coastal]] [[province]] of [[eastern]] [[China]] between [[Hangzhou]] [[bay|Bay]] and [[Fujian]].
# {{lb|zh|historical|geography}} The [[Zhe]] [[river|River]], a [[former]] [[name]] of the [[Qiantang]] [[river|River]] of [[Zhejiang]].
